root.name: Orgarhythm
root.description: Orgarhythm is a touch based action strategy game where you control the God of Light in his battle against his brother and the Dark Tribe.Rhythm is central to the game and players must tap to the beat to issue orders to the god's followers, the Warriors of Light. These followers are aligned with three elements (fire, water and earth) and this forms the basis of a rock, paper, scissors battle system where players should use the appropriate element to maximize their attacks against enemies. Troops can be assigned four different types when ordering them.
